name: Super Space-Stronaut (Bokstret)
description:
This is my 2D Platformer project. 

Modifications:
1) Developed three game levels with increasing difficulty.

2) A script that counts the number of jumps that a player can use. The indicator is at the top of the screen, next to score.

3) A script that allows you to restart the current level in case of death. In the window after death, in addition to the Main Menu button, a Retry button is created.

4) The instructions section is filled with information about the game and tips. 

5) Bombs have been created, a new type of obstacles. They use new art and sound.

Credits:

 Created by Wakim Johnny.
